name: shoot-em-all
description:
1 player kill increments counter.
1 player hit decrements the counter.
If your counter go down to 0, you loose, if the counter go up to 150, you win.
Press 'WASD' to move
Press 'E' to shoot
Press 'ESC' to exit
-Now, press 'E' to start killing spaceships like a boss-
ez pizi.
